overview: Hierarchy view for GitHub Projects is now available in public preview. You can now view your full issue hierarchy directly in project table views, giving you clear visibility into complex work breakdowns without losing context or switching views.

detailed_explanation.title: Overview
bullets: Hierarchy view for GitHub Projects is now available in public preview. You can now view your full issue hierarchy directly in project table views, giving you clear visibility into complex work breakdowns without losing context or switching views.

detailed_explanation.title: üîó What is hierarchy view?
bullets: Hierarchy view lets you see the full nesting of sub-issues directly in GitHub Projects.
With hierarchy view enabled, you can:
Expand and collapse sub-issues up to eight levels deep.
Group, slice, sort, and filter while preserving hierarchy.
View and quickly add existing sub-issues that aren‚Äôt in the project yet.

detailed_explanation.title: Getting started
bullets: To enable hierarchy view, open the View menu and turn on Show hierarchy .

detailed_explanation.title: Performance enhancements to issues
